item.title: What the f*** is conda
item.description: Install conda. Install miniconda. Pick Linux > Miniconda3 Linux 64-bit unless you are a little baby. Say yes to conda init. Fix default things that conda does Close your terminal and open another, or source ~.bashrc or wherever you have bashrc. Prevent conda from activating base environment by default conda config --set auto_activate_base false Checkout base packages conda list If you had installed anaconda, you’d have 6 million base packages.
